name: mastodon
description: Mastodon is an open-source, federated social network offering microblogging with privacy controls and decentralized hosting. Users can create and follow accounts across instances without a central platform.
features: Federated network: Connect with users across different Mastodon instances and ActivityPub-compatible platforms.
Microblogging: Post text, images, videos, and polls with character limits and content warnings.
Privacy controls: Choose post visibility from public, unlisted, followers-only, or direct messages.
Content moderation: Block, mute, or report users and filter content with customizable word filters.
Timeline views: Browse home, local, and federated timelines to discover content and conversations.
Media handling: Upload and share images, videos, and audio with automatic processing and thumbnails.
Custom emojis: Add instance-specific custom emojis for expressive communication.
Hashtag following: Follow hashtags to see relevant posts without following individual accounts.
List management: Organize followed accounts into lists for focused timeline viewing.
Mobile apps: Access through official and third-party mobile apps for iOS and Android.
Admin tools: Comprehensive moderation and administration interface for instance management.
API access: Build custom clients and integrations using the well-documented Mastodon API.
